verses.verse: A Psalm for <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>. <S%H5414>Give<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, and thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.
He shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and thy <S%H6041>poor<s%> with <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the little <S%H1389>hills<s%>, by <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

He shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, he shall <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%>, and shall break in <S%H1792>pieces<s%> the <S%H6231>oppressor<s%>.
They shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee as long <S%H5973>as<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H6440>endure<s%>, throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
He shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H4306>rain<s%> upon the <S%H1488>mown<s%> grass: as <S%H7241>showers<s%> that <S%H2222>water<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
In his <S%H3117>days<s%> shall the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6524>flourish<s%>; and <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> so long as the <S%H3394>moon<s%> endureth.
He shall have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> also from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and from the <S%H5104>river<s%> unto the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
They that dwell in the <S%H6728>wilderness<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; and his <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> and of the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H4503>presents<s%>: the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H5434>Seba<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H814>gifts<s%>.
Yea, all <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall fall <S%H7812>down<s%> before him: all <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him.
For he shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> when he <S%H7768>crieth<s%>; the <S%H6041>poor<s%> also, and him that hath no <S%H5826>helper<s%>.
He shall <S%H2347>spare<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>, and shall <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%>.
He shall <S%H1350>redeem<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H8496>deceit<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%>: and <S%H3365>precious<s%> shall their <S%H1818>blood<s%> be in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

And he shall <S%H2421>live<s%>, and to him shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> of the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%>: prayer also shall be <S%H6419>made<s%> for him <S%H8548>continually<s%>; and <S%H3117>daily<s%> shall he be <S%H1288>praised<s%>.

There shall be an <S%H6451>handful<s%> of <S%H1250>corn<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> like <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>: and they of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H6692>flourish<s%> like <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

His <S%H8034>name<s%> shall endure for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H5125%H5125>continued<s%> as long <S%H6440>as<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>: and men shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> in him: all <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall call him <S%H833>blessed<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who only <S%H6213>doeth<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things<s%>.

And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be his <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: and let the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with his <S%H3519>glory<s%>; <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
The <S%H8605>prayers<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> are <S%H3615>ended<s%>.
